name: Wraith Mechanics
description:
This is a small game implementing the abilities of Wraith, a character from Apex Legends. The game consists of a set of situations that can be traversed using given abilities. This project was completed within a period of a week.

The abilities are Voices from the Void(Passive), Void Walking(Special) and Portal(Ultimate).

The project started with me wanting to implement the game mechanics and systems of Wraith's abilities in Unity and subsequently I turned it into a small game, allowing the player to actively use these abilities to achieve a goal.

This was a fun project and I believe that I would be uploading similar such projects soon. :)
